title: Ristorante Fiore
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened Feb 2014, this Italian food restaurant offers a separate vegan menu card with different pastas, faux meat entrees, numerous kinds of vegan pizza, vegan desserts like tiramisu and pana cotta, and vegan wine. Somedays a vegan buffet. Has a lounge with both smoking and non-smoking areas.
